articles.title: Pregnant women should get Covid-19 vaccine, US doctors say, despite conflicting international advice
articles.description: If you're pregnant during the pandemic, major US medical groups have a clear message for you. Please consider being vaccinated against Covid-19, even if you've heard conflicting advice from international agencies.

articles.author: Maria Morava and Saeed Ahmed, CNN
articles.title: A Georgia city is replacing a Confederate monument with a statue of civil rights hero John Lewis
articles.description: For 112 years, a 30-foot obelisk stood outside the courthouse grounds in the suburban Atlanta city of Decatur. In its place, officials now plan to erect a monument that honors the late John Lewis, a man who spent his entire life fighting for civil rights.

articles.description: Famed former Temple University men's basketball coach John Chaney passed away at the age of 89 on Friday. Temple confirmed Chaney died after a short illness.

articles.title: Putin signs law extending nuclear arms treaty between US and Russia
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law on Friday ratifying the extension of New START, a key arms control treaty with the United States, a week before it was due to expire, the Kremlin said in a statement.

articles.title: Coronavirus vaccine makes a long, cold journey to rural America
articles.description: The Pfizer/BioNtech coronavirus vaccine completed an arduous journey through development and approval -- but still is left with hundreds of miles to go to reach waiting arms once it arrives in rural America.
